verses.verse: Come near<WH7126>, you nations<WH1471>, to hear<WH8085>; and listen<WH7181>, you people<WH3816>: let the earth<WH776> hear<WH8085>, and all that is in it<WH4393>; the world<WH8398>, and all things that come forth of it<WH6631>.

For the indignation<WH7110> of the Lord<WH3068> is upon all nations<WH1471>, and his fury<WH2534> upon all their armies<WH6635>: he has utterly destroyed<WH2763> them<WH5414>, he has delivered them to the slaughter<WH2874>.

Their slain<WH2491> also shall be cast out<WH7993>, and their stink<WH889> shall come up<WH5927> out of their carcasses<WH6297>, and the mountains<WH2022> shall be melted<WH4549> with their blood<WH1818>.

And all the army<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> shall be dissolved<WH4743>, and the heavens<WH8064> shall be rolled together<WH1556> as a scroll<WH5612>: and all their army<WH6635> shall fall down<WH5034>, as the leaf<WH5929> falls off<WH5034> from the vine<WH1612>, and as a falling<WH5034> fig from the fig tree<WH8384>.
For my sword<WH2719> shall be bathed<WH7301> in heaven<WH8064>: behold<WH3381>, it shall come down upon Edom<WH123>, and upon the people<WH5971> of my curse<WH2764>, to judgment<WH4941>.

The sword<WH2719> of the Lord<WH3068> is filled<WH4390> with blood<WH1818>, it is made fat<WH1878> with fatness<WH2459>, and with the blood<WH1818> of lambs<WH3733> and goats<WH6260>, with the fat<WH2459> of the kidneys<WH3629> of rams<WH352>: for the Lord<WH3068> has a sacrifice<WH2077> in Bozrah<WH1224>, and a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH2874> in the land<WH776> of Edom<WH123>.

And the unicorns<WH7214> shall come down<WH3381> with them<WH6499>, and the bullocks with the bulls<WH47>; and their land<WH776> shall be soaked<WH7301> with blood<WH1818>, and their dust<WH6083> made fat<WH1878> with fatness<WH2459>.
For it is the day<WH3117> of the Lord<WH3068>'s vengeance<WH5359>, and the year<WH8141> of recompences<WH7966> for the controversy<WH7379> of Zion<WH6726>.
And the streams<WH5158> there shall be turned<WH2015> into pitch<WH2203>, and the dust<WH6083> there into brimstone<WH1614>, and the land<WH776> there shall become burning<WH1197> pitch<WH2203>.

It shall not be quenched<WH3518> night<WH3915> nor day<WH3119>; the smoke<WH6227> there shall go up<WH5927> for ever<WH5769>: from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> it shall lie waste<WH2717>; none shall pass through<WH5674> it for ever<WH5331> and ever<WH5331>.

But the pelican<WH6893> and the bittern<WH7090> shall possess<WH3423> it<WH3244>; the owl also and the raven<WH6158> shall live<WH7931> in it<WH5186>: and he shall stretch out upon it the line<WH6957> of confusion<WH8414>, and the stones<WH68> of emptiness<WH922>.
They shall call<WH7121> the nobles<WH2715> there to the kingdom<WH4410>, but none shall be there<WH8269>, and all her princes shall be nothing<WH657>.

And thorns<WH5518> shall come up<WH5927> in her palaces<WH759>, nettles<WH7057> and brambles<WH2336> in the fortresses<WH4013> there<WH5116>: and it shall be a habitation of dragons<WH8577>, and a court<WH2681> for owls<WH1323>.

The wild animals of the desert<WH6728> shall also meet<WH6298> with the wild animals of the island<WH338>, and the satyr<WH8163> shall cry<WH7121> to his fellow<WH7453>; the screech owl<WH3917> also shall rest<WH7280> there<WH4672>, and find for herself a place of rest<WH4494>.

There shall the great owl<WH7091> make her nest<WH7077>, and lay<WH4422>, and hatch<WH1234>, and gather<WH1716> under her shadow<WH6738>: there shall the vultures<WH1772> also be gathered<WH6908>, every one<WH802> with her mate<WH7468>.

Seek you out<WH1875> of the book<WH5612> of the Lord<WH3068>, and read<WH7121>: no one<WH259> of these<WH2007> shall fail<WH5737>, none<WH802> shall want<WH6485> her mate<WH7468>: for my mouth<WH6310> it has commanded<WH6680>, and his spirit<WH7307> it has gathered them<WH6908>.

And he has cast<WH5307> the lot<WH1486> for them<WH3027>, and his hand has divided<WH2505> it unto them by line<WH6957>: they shall possess<WH3423> it for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> shall they live in it<WH7931>.
